en.herosubtitle: Junior React Front-End Developer from the UK
en.abouttext1: I am a front-end developer from the United Kingdom, focused on building modern, clean, and responsive user interfaces using React and current web technologies. I enjoy turning ideas into smooth and interactive digital experiences.
en.abouttext2: I quickly adapt to new tools and technologies, and I approach technical challenges with structured and logical problem-solving. I’m comfortable working under pressure, managing time effectively, and collaborating within teams.
en.abouttext3: My goal is to join a professional development team where I can contribute to building high-quality digital products. I am committed to improving my skills, deepening my knowledge of the front-end ecosystem, and creating interfaces that deliver real value.
en.skillsjs.desc: My main language for building dynamic and interactive interfaces
en.skillstsdesc: A typed version of JavaScript that helps improve code reliability
en.skillshtmldesc: Markup language I use to structure web pages
en.skillscssdesc: Styling language I use to design modern and responsive layouts
en.projectsproject1desc: A fully responsive e-commerce interface built with React, custom hooks, and API integration.
en.projectsproject2desc: A productivity front-end app built with React, supporting filters and smooth animations.
en.projectsproject3desc: A modern portfolio showcasing my front-end skills using React, CSS, and animations.
en.project1disc: A modern and fully responsive restaurant website that allows visitors to explore the menu, read details about the restaurant, and access contact and location information with a clean design.
en.project2disc: A full e-commerce web application built with React featuring product browsing, cart management, checkout flow, and an admin dashboard. Available in multiple languages including English, Arabic, and Ukrainian.
